description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ssa7","text":"This protocol describes how to make an acoustic droplet ejection compatible plate for liquid handling on the Echo 555 using an epMotion 5075. The protocol expects (4) 96-well gDNA plates and an empty 384-well polypropylene (PP) echo destination plate. The 4 plates will be compressed in a fully interweaved layout. The following images depict this pattern. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16msp","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0},{"offset":1,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8tesu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emkce","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdqtc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75c2t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgs5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53ceu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"source":"","placeholder":"","original_name":"Screen Shot 2018-10-03 at 10.02.33 AM.png","mime":"image/png","is_video":false}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/8bc3mm6.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/8bc3mm6.png","original_name":"Screen Shot 2018-10-03 at 10.02.33 AM.png","mime":"image/png","is_video":false}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"30783","guid":"78BFAB40C74811E888FFD39068BDD60C","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/8b93mm6.png","placeholder":"","original_name":"Screen Shot 2018-10-03 at 10.03.19 AM.png","mime":"image/png","width":null,"height":null,"is_video":false}}}}
before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ctel","text":"Please wear at least the minimum required personal protective equipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6aj4n","text":"Ensure that all necessary kit components are available as well as user-supplied consumables.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1pfb","text":"Remove nuclease and nucleotide contamination from work surfaces and instruments prior to starting using an appropriate solution, such as RNase AWAY™ (Thermo Scientific™ catalogue: 700511), followed by wiping with 70% to 100% molecular biology grade ethanol to remove additional contaminants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials.reagent_name: ep T.I.P.S. Motion Racks 20 - 300 µL w/ filter
